welcome.heroText: Three years of starlight gone by, yet we're still as lovely as then

recentActivities.title: Recent Activities
recentActivities.description: Gudupao's 3rd anniversary celebration video series will be released after December 30, 2025. Please follow our official accounts on all platforms or BiliBili account 冬瓜Cherry. Happy 3rd anniversary, celebrating our journey of over 1000 days!

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The Innovative Light That Illuminates the Future

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Gudupao Spark Inc. was founded three years ago. We are a passionate team dedicated to illuminating the future through technological innovation. From our initial dreams to today's achievements, we have always maintained our original aspirations to create value for our users.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe in the power of technology to change the world. Our mission is to make technology's convenience and beauty accessible to everyone through innovative products and services.

values.title: Our Values
values.innovationDesc: Constantly exploring new technologies, pursuing excellence
values.passionDesc: Passionate about our work, caring for our users
values.integrityDesc: Honest and trustworthy, consistent in words and actions

owners.name: ldx
owners.bio: Leading the team with vision and passion

team.title: Our Team
team.content: We are a diverse team from different backgrounds, but we share a common dream. Every member is an indispensable part of the team.

journey.title: Three Years Journey
journey.content: From day one to day 1000, we've walked an unforgettable journey together. Thanks to all our friends who support us, let's continue forward together!

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore our innovative projects and contributions

contact.twitter_desc: Stay updated with our latest news
